messages.title: The local champion for OUR NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have increased the health budget every year and have delivered £2billion in extra funding for frontline NHS services this year alone.
The first ever waiting times for mental health treatment are being introduced and £400m is being used to help sufferers get the right support early on.
Services across the NHS have improved, with more doctors, lower waiting times and better access to cancer drugs many patients were denied under Labour.

issues.health: The Lib Dems have increased the health budget every year and have delivered £2billion in extra funding for frontline NHS services this year alone. The first ever waiting times for mental health treatment are being introduced and £400m is being used to help sufferers get the right support early on. Services across the NHS have improved, with more doctors, lower waiting times and better access to cancer drugs many patients were denied under Labour.

leaflet.personalStatement: I’m immensely proud of the great work our Children’s Hospital does, and these improvements will create the best possible environment for children to get better more quickly.

politicalExperience.achievements: Launched building work at Sheffield Children's Hospital

images.caption: Nick Clegg launches building work at Sheffield Children's Hospital
